p: To halt the intrusion of new pathogens through animal trade, the OIE has framed certain standards and guidelines. These guidelines are followed for animals (livestock, poultry, fish, aquatic animals and wildlife) and animal products, including meat and meat products, milk and milk products, egg and egg products, fish and fish products. The standards developed by the OIE from 1995 onwards have been formally recognized by the agreement on the application of sanitary and phytosanitary measures (SPS agreement) of the WTO.
